11.20.19  2:19 am   hey, i think i snagged the chords to the 'beautiful' jingle from the opening to history of japan, but i'm not sure i got it all- do you have the demo of it? i think it's
Bma7 / F#, for beau-
E-7 / G (or like G6), for -ti-
D-7 / C (kinda sounds sus-y), for -ful

      you may be right (i didn't listen to it). and i don't have the demo with me but i will give it to you some other time

11.20.19  2:18 am   i wanna go outside but its just too hot out. what should i do?

-person currently indoors

      sounds like you've got a pretty good reality show on your hands

11.20.19  1:46 am   I'm lonely and don't have any friends because I push people away. I feel misunderstood. Would you like to be my friend and get sandwiches with me?
What sandwich would you like?

     i would prefer a friendship that goes beyond the sandwich

      Also do you say that each question makes you stronger because they make you feel warm and fuzzy sometimes?

     no, they make me stronger because they challenge me to find new ways of looking at the exact same thing as before

11.20.19  1:26 am   How do you feel about cats?

      meowtastic

11.20.19  12:49 am   advantages of using a pogo-stick?

      street cred

11.20.19  12:34 am   Once the technology exists, do you have anyone who you would like to merge your conciousness with?

     everyone

      I wanna merge with a dolphin

11.20.19  12:26 am   should i drink more alcohol than most people recommend just to see what happens?

      what if you drink less than people recommend

11.20.19  12:17 am   Man, I'm just realizing all the dimensions of power in editing the video for a song. You've gotta line up the clip just right to hit the music well, both visually and in terms of timing. THAT'S how you really make the music pop!! Now just imagine putting the whole thing in 3D.....

      oh ive imagined it. and my pants are all wet but i'm still building the necessary skills

11.20.19  12:15 am   Will we ever get to know what ice butter is?

      i think that was a rectangular prism that changed color from blue to yellow

11.20.19  12:13 am   What is life? I have a felling you know what it is

      some sort of gosh dam miracle

11.19.19  11:56 pm   How can I stop the sadness Bill. I need help. :(

      arts and crafts, especially crafts

11.19.19  11:48 pm   I miss you bill can you tell me something that I would only see in your videos 

      one of my favorite things about making videos is saying things that seem like something i would not say

11.19.19  11:47 pm   have you ever said something like "riddle me this" out loud to someone

      maybe once

11.19.19  11:36 pm   Hi thanks for checking back in are you still a piece of awesomeness 

      i am doing my best

11.19.19  11:27 pm   If you could change the sea level, how much would you change it?

      i would maybe lower it by about 50 feet, but my opinion might be affected by the fact that i am in miami beach currently

11.19.19  11:25 pm   what are your thoughts on climate change

      every time i get used to the climate the dang thing changes

11.19.19  11:13 pm   where am I? how did I get to this questions page?

      assuredly by unicorn

11.19.19  11:03 pm   How often do you forget the lyrics to your own songs? 

      each time i write them

11.19.19  10:52 pm   How to become Paul McCartney?

      i will tell you how he did it, which was first to wonder how to become someone else and then eventually settle for being himself. that is what i would recommend for you also except the name will be different and possibly even more exciting

      no but perhaps i should

W H A T ' S  smaller than a quark? 

      like a muon or lepton or something

      rice

     the vagina

      And where do we go when we all fall asleep?

     into the bed vagina, every bed has a vagina

11.19.19  10:26 pm   If you had the first thing that did the first first of things of first, which first first of the first thing of first firsts would you first first to first the thing to the first thing?

      the second one

11.19.19  10:10 pm   hi I'm the egg man and I would like to ask, do you enjoy these questions

      the most enjoyable thing for me is when i first don't enjoy the question and then i am able to find enjoyment from it regardless

11.19.19  9:53 pm   How to shower with soap without getting eaten by the demon because the soap in your eyes.

      wear a blindfold?

11.19.19  9:52 pm   are you a genius

      i can climb a ladder very high. does that count

11.19.19  9:49 pm   how do I know if music is real, or if I am real

      do the 5 finger test. if music made you feel anything then music is real and you are too

11.19.19  9:48 pm   do you know anything about coding? 

      not really

11.19.19  9:42 pm   I feel as though you've studied music in a university,

     absolutely not but i bought some of their books once, which was a useful tool for learning the names of things, but honestly a lot of the names they use are not what the rest of the world uses, so

      and I've realized this isn't a question?

11.19.19  9:34 pm   :(

      thank you very much

11.19.19  9:26 pm   Every day at the beginning of class, my English teacher asks us all a question and has us write about it and discuss it as a class. I usually find these discussions quite enjoyable and thought-provoking. Today's question  was, "What does success mean?" I was wondering, how would you personally define success?

     i think it means getting the results you want, but only if it was at least somewhat challenging. if you do something that's automatically easy i don't think that counts as success. if you try to do something and struggle with it and then eventually get it, then i think that counts

      And also, would it be cool if I asked you some of the other questions my teacher has asked us?

11.19.19  9:07 pm   11.19.19  7:51 am I think this is a fucking great idea.. maybe you could limit yourself to adding one question to the page per day? Since it seems like a lot of days you have one particularly burning question (e.g. how to make skies)

      got the sky, now i'm wondering how to save it as a preset. or how to save anything as a preset, for easy access. textures, objects, .... have it on call as favorites. i have seen some tutorials about importing it from a file browser and clicking a bunch of things, but there has got to be a quicker way than that. i've seen some other methods with 'material libraries' which seems promising but i still actually can't figure out how to do it. i would appreciate tips from anyone on this

11.19.19  9:01 pm   What is music?

      magic

11.19.19  8:52 pm   Are you working on something?

      i'm learning to make videos

11.19.19  8:26 pm   plz make a new video

      that almost didn't even occur to me

11.19.19  7:39 pm   Today I feel like making something with lego bricks, do you have any suggestions for what I should build?

      how about a marshmallow

11.19.19  7:35 pm   Why are sandwich's always better when someone else makes them? 

      there's a certain element of mystery. did they try to poison you? eat the sandwich and find out ......

11.19.19  6:48 pm   i really enjoy the sensation of rolling up an earplug into a tight little spike, pushing it deep into my ear, and letting it expand so it puts pressure on my deep inner ear canal. it feels so good that it almost feels like a trance. but i can't find any info on whether this is bad for me long term, do you happen to know? i have dry (asian) type earwax, not wet (white ppl) type earwax, if that makes a difference

      that is generally the right way to do it, but please make sure you don't push it TOO far. it is important to roll it so it goes in well enough not to fall out, and also what i do is i reach over my head with the opposite hand and pull the ear up, before putting it in. but you must be careful not to go any further than you need to

11.19.19  6:20 pm   how do i eat food?

      you don't wanna know

11.19.19  6:19 pm   how do you feel about songs with a bunch of vocal parts with different words playing at the same time?

     usually an epic fail

      what's a good example of this?

     i can't recall any examples other than trying it myself and realizing exactly why it won't work

      would you ever do something like this?

     if you say 2 words at the same time, neither are understood

11.19.19  6:11 pm   Are birds real?

      NO WAY

      brb out to lunch

      yes. that's the definition of world. world means "ok"

11.19.19  5:58 pm   Should I stop?

      did you even start yet

11.19.19  5:54 pm   I heard your find questions that ask you if your annoyed by something annoying why actually I just realized I'm asking you why you find something annoying which you find annoying okay fine scrap this question tell me your favorite color or something 

      dark black

11.19.19  5:46 pm   Is rain wet?

      my legal team has advised me not to comment on this subject

11.19.19  5:43 pm   Opinion on thunder and lightning?

      thunder is the sound of lightning

11.19.19  5:42 pm   what do you think is a good question to ask

      what

11.19.19  5:20 pm   What is your earliest memory?

      probably looking at shapes and wondering where the hell i am
